attributes.action: Outlawing of automated recorded telemarketing calls
attributes.additional_details: Registering with the toothless TPS seems to have little or no effect on companies using automated messages advertising recovery of miss - sold PPI or trying to incite accident compensation claims. These calls are a major nuisance and people should be protected in their own homes from this invasion of privacy. I would propose to make illegal the indiscriminate automated calling using recorded messages.
